note:
I have coached practical skills, for over 20 years and worked a great deal with Eastern ideologies.
I worked on Edward De Bono team. Set up to introduce 'thinking skills' into the UK primary schools curriculum. Sadly the government pulled the plug, one hour before the day of a nation wide launch. I then worked on the missing three quarters of our current science model. With a mathematical friend. Illustrating and publishing an 'outline' of his life's work. Again blocked by authorities.
